venue.name: Hess Gas - Intersection Mass Pike, Rt 128, and Commonwealth Ave

item.description:
What do I want to do on my birthday?

Ride to NH with my scooter buddies for the Whitehorse Gear Open house!

We will meetup at the Hess, then connect with other riders at locations TBD

I've opted to go to Whitehorse Gear in Conway NH instead of VT for my Birthday Ride. If you have never been to Whitehorse Gear, it's a mail order warehouse that you can shop at. Many products, prices are average - but for the open house there will be sales going on and a ton of bikes for sure. Of course we will ride the Kang while we are there and perhaps even hurricane Mtn Road!

We start early and get back at sundown, should be a blast!

Slab to and from - 65 MPH AVG, ATG for this ride, staggered formation, 3 second rule please!

If you RSVP's Yes for Mac & Cheese and are already planning to join us on this ride, you do not need to change a thing, however if this ride is not your cup of tea then please change your RSVP.

Looking forward to this!

Paul
item.name: Whitehorse Gear Open house!
